jobs.title: Director of Operations
jobs.description: Metropolitan manages 90 residential and commercial buildings and homeowners associations. As Director of Operations I create the vision for systems and workflows while overseeing day-to-day business activity. I directly supervise intern and administrative staff while owning and overseeing several essential systems: operations, database, communications, and accounting. My responsibilities also extend to management of information systems to include data and software migrations and maintenance of websites.  Most importantly, I guide new clients through the first 90 days of the management contract.

jobs.title: Owner
jobs.description: Lucky Grain created artisan furniture from locally recycled tree waste. We met our goal to reduce landfill waste by reusing waste material for all client projects. As owner of Lucky Grain I managed all business activity including bookeeping, customer relations, social media management, material sourcing, machinery upkeep, and design and build on all projects.

jobs.title: Program Manager
jobs.description: As Program Manager at a growing technology marketing company, my main objective ensured that all client orders were filled timely and that quality leads were delivered and formatted to customer satisfaction. Additionally I captured daily, weekly, and monthly revenue numbers at a company with average annual revenue of $9MM.

jobs.title: Operations Manager
jobs.description: As Operations Manager, my key responsibilities included maintaining day-to-day processes including accounting, client relations, legal, and tax compliance.  Under the direction of the company President, I created systems and processes that allowed the business to double in under two years.
